channel.title: L4D2 Authoring Tools + Sacrifice Update
channel.description: Can anybody tell me what changes this update brought to the SDK (new/altered abilities for mod-ers), or point me to a list, because I'm having trouble finding a list or anything helpful.

item.title: L4D2 Authoring Tools + Sacrifice Update
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
You can if you vscript, and set it to use survivor set 1.

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2 Authoring Tools + Sacrifice Update
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
I saw somewhere that a “button_timed” entity was re-introduced with this DLC, but I can’t find anything else. Like, is it possible to tell the game which survivors to use in my mod? (without the complex stuff that people did to get the l4d1 survivors in before)

Read full topic

item.title: L4D2 Authoring Tools + Sacrifice Update
item.dc:creator: Aaagreen
item.description:
That’s usually all that happens with Authoring Tool updates. Source SDK updates just seem to break everything.

amirite?

Read full topic
